files.title: 20.4.3. Shared Memory
files.summary: ### 20.4.3. Shared Memory[](#shared-memory-5-x "Permalink to this headline")  Shared memory has 32 banks that are organized such that successive 32-bit words map to successive banks. Each bank has a ...
